duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and develop opportunities to increase the organization’s profitability through sales strategies and relationship management.
Manage the entire sales cycle from finding a client to securing a deal, including negotiation and professional after-sales support.
Unearth new sales opportunities through networking and turn them into long-term partnerships.
Research organizations and individuals to find new opportunities and negotiate pricing and other terms of customer agreements.
Develop and implement marketing plans to increase the customer base and forecast sales revenue.
Manage and retain relationships with existing customers, respond to complaints, and resolve issues to maintain customer satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
